feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.0.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Made logging way more readable for all the apps.
  • Fixed Readarr's Upgrade Module

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.0.11...6.0.12

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

For Sonarr, multiple missing modes have been added.

  • Season Solo mode searches for episodes missing within a season, but uses an API hit per episode as it looks for each episode individually.
  • Season Packs mode is better for torrent users and some users, as it uses one API hit as it searches for the entire season
  • Show mode has been added back, which will use an API hit per missing episode, looking for each show individually.

  • Sonarr Upgrades by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/213
  • Sonarr Updates by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/214 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.0.12...6.1.0

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Whisparr works and is test with v2. v3 status unknown at this time pending further testing, but if you have this in your about for Whisparr, it will work

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.1.1...6.1.2

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: Rewrote and Added Swaparr
entry.content:
Original Project - https://github.com/ThijmenGThN/swaparr

Converted and built swappar native to Huntarr! NOTE THIS IS FOR TORRENT USERS!

What's Changed

  • Intergration of Swappar by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/230
  • Added Swappar by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/231 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.1.2...6.1.3
